basics.name: Shannon Kam
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Engineering at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2023.

highlights: Manage and evaluate assignments from students
Update, confirm, and input information on the registered physicians in the company's database

awards.title: Pledge Master of IEEE-HKN Eta Kappa Nu (Delta Omega Chapter)
awards.summary: HKN is a national honor society for electrical and computer engineers. Members are selected based on academics, character, and leadership skills.

awards.title: Chancellor's Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded based on exemplary academic, extracurricular and community achievements.

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Earn a semester GPA of 3.5 or higher based on 12 credits or more.
